item.title: CRM Subgrids
item.description: Aww yeah, my blog post!! * povej za HTTPS * povej, zakaj rabiš * povej, kako si dobil URL * povej, kako si rešil I tested my assumptions using an IFrame directly on the form. Dynamics’ Form Editor allows you to add a WebResource onto a form, but it also allow you to put just an Iframe. You provide the URL and the content pops up. Yaay! The ribbon worked.

item.title: Hacking Convert to Case button
My First Post
item.description: Testing the installation… UIIII!!! I have my very own website!!
